New Records: Jackson Chourio hit his 3rd game with at least 4 RBI in 2024, tying him behind only Mel Ott, Paul Cavarretta, and Juan Soto for the fewest such games by a player younger than 21 in National League history
Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio hit a grand slam in the sixth inning against the St. Louis Cardinals
Post-Match Reflections: The Milwaukee Brewers remain in contention for the No. 1 overall seed in the National League playoffs after the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers will face the St. Louis Cardinals again on Tuesday at 7:40 p.m. ET
